metadata.title: The lifecycle Meta-Argument - Configuration Language
metadata.description: The meta-arguments in a lifecycle block allow you to customize resource behavior.

and then create a new replacement object with the new configured arguments.`),mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},"The ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"create_before_destroy"),` meta-argument changes this behavior so that
